00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  *
00031  * lustre/include/lustre_log_user.h
00032  *
00033  * Userspace-usable portion of Generic infrastructure for managing
00034  * a collection of logs.
00035  * See lustre_log.h for more details.
00036  */
00037 
00038 #ifndef _LUSTRE_LOG_USER_H
00039 #define _LUSTRE_LOG_USER_H
00040 
00041 /*  Lustre logs use FIDs constructed from oi_id and oi_seq directly,
00042  *  without attempting to use the IGIF and IDIF ranges as is done
00043  *  elsewhere, because of compatibility concerns (see lu-2888).
00044  */
00045 
00046 static inline void logid_to_fid(struct llog_logid *id, struct lu_fid *fid)
00047 {
00048         /* For compatibility purposes we identify pre-OSD (~< 2.3.51 MDS)
00049          * logid's by non-zero ogen (inode generation) and convert them
00050          * into IGIF */
00051         if (id->lgl_ogen == 0) {
00052                 fid->f_seq = id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_seq;
00053                 fid->f_oid = id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_id;
00054                 fid->f_ver = 0;
00055         } else {
00056                 lu_igif_build(fid, id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_id, id->lgl_ogen);
00057         }
00058 }
00059 
00060 static inline void fid_to_logid(struct lu_fid *fid, struct llog_logid *id)
00061 {
00062         id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_seq = fid->f_seq;
00063         id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_id = fid->f_oid;
00064         id->lgl_ogen = 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 static inline void logid_set_id(struct llog_logid *log_id, __u64 id)
00068 {
00069         log_id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_id = id;
00070 }
00071 
00072 static inline __u64 logid_id(struct llog_logid *log_id)
00073 {
00074         return log_id->lgl_oi.oi.oi_id;
00075 }
00076 
00077 #endif /* ifndef _LUSTRE_LOG_USER_H */
